verbose_text: MAp44 has been associated with cardioprotective effects, preserving cardiac function, decreasing infarct area, and preventing thrombogenesis in murine models of ischemia / reperfusion injury by inhibiting MBL and C3 deposition [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
